content: **note shop closed fall 2008 pattern still available through the internet archive - scroll down to locate ** the beauty of this stocking you can use any yarn and a hook a size or three larger than normal and go to town - although i usually make this in worsted or bulky yarns it looks stunning in mohair and multi-strands of sock yarns very fast to work up you can make a stocking in 3 hours no gauge given specifically in the pattern as shown design uses two colors of yarn but quantities are not specified
